name: UIS Technology Partners
tag_list: it-support, it-consulting, it-outsourcing, it-projects, cabling, managed-services
overview:
Founded in 1996, UIS Technology Partners provides full-service IT outsourcing solutions to small, mid-market, and enterprise companies throughout Northern California. UIS provides IT Support San Francisco expert services to most markets including Financial, Venture Capital, CPA and Accounting, Law Offices, Architectural, Technology-based start-ups, Manufacturing, and Non-Profits.

UIS is a proud member of the Better Business Bureau and have an “A+ Rating.”

Our employees include a wide array of seasoned professionals which are subject-matter experts in many areas including IT Strategic Planning, Business Continuity, Project Management, Network Assessment, Disaster Recovery planning, and many Industry Standard technologies. Our teams hold certifications from technology leaders such as Microsoft, VMware, Cisco, Citrix and Novell.

We realize a one size solution does not fit all. Our focus is to understand our clientâ€™s business and to become a part of their team. At UIS Technology Partners one of the first steps we take in a new client relationship is to assess your specific business processes and needs. We then perform a comprehensive and detailed Network Assessment of your current network infrastructure to determine if your existing technologies are supporting your business goals. Based on this information we compose a Network and Business Assessment document presented to you in clear, understandable English.
